name: Last Day of the Woods
description:
Will it really be the last?

The Plot

Everything is dying in this small world because of evil human spirits. Play as a spirit of the woods, who dares to call the Small God for help when things gone wrong.

Authors

Everything, including music, art and code was created by me - @rbdpade

Features

  • Unique game mechanic with teleportation. Try it yourself!
  • Challenging puzzles
  • Two endings
  • 80 secret items to collect

This game was created for Ludum Dare #38 in 72 hours with no sleep, no food, no life.

Feel free to check my first game!
